short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A calculator for feet and inches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Feet & Inches Calculator. Adding and Subtracting measurements that are in feet and inches format can be annoying. I created this to have on hand when you don't have time to math. Simple and straight to the point.
